messages.subject: Harry Potter (was Re: Young earth vs. old earth)
messages.msgSnippet: ... And we know why, it isn t about Magic but because Harry is so disobedient. And those books show adults who are not perfect and wrongly use their power
messages.messageBody:
Sandra wrote:

>According to MANY Christian homeschooling sites, you'll get
>that for reading
>Harry Potter books, AND any minister who has said Harry Potter
>is not so bad
>is going to get the same lake of brimstone. AND SOON, they
>hope.

And we know why, it isn't about Magic but because Harry is so disobedient. And
those books show adults who are not perfect and wrongly use their power
against children. And the children see the hypocrisy and abuse and react
against it. Imagine that. Powerful kids.

Peggy


"there isn't anything here that I can't do."
